name: memery
tag_list: brand-awareness, brand-marketing, brisbane-pr, brisbane-pr-agency, brisbane-public-relations, digital-marketing, facebook-marketing, social-media-marketing, social-media-strategies
overview:
Memery is a conversation agency: we get people talking about your brand, we make you newsworthy and we listen to conversations happening online to make sure you are a part of the buzz.

Memery is everything a digital company should be, aiming to provide an integrated solution for clients that combines traditional communication platforms with the new and ever-changing world of social networks and digital media.

Providing public relations, Facebook marketing, social media marketing strategies, monitoring of social networks using Dialogix, brand awareness and digital marketing strategies from Brisbane and throughout Australia.

providerships.title: Web design, search engine optimisation, search engine marketing (Adwords), Email Newsletters
